name: The Changing of Paths - Protector No More
tooltip:
The Changing of Paths - Protector No More

Champion, should you decide to walk another path, present me with your signet ring and a mountain of scarabs from our enemies in Ahn'Qiraj.

Requirements:
- Signet Ring of the Bronze Dragonflight
- Stone Scarab x 15
- Gold Scarab x 15
- Silver Scarab x 15
